context7.description: Advanced codebase understanding and context management. Reduces errors by 40% by providing Claude Code with better context about your project structure, dependencies, and relationships.

sentry.description: Error tracking and performance monitoring integration. Provides real-time visibility into production issues, crash reports, and performance bottlenecks - essential for maintaining reliable TypeScript applications.

playwright.description: Official Playwright integration for browser automation and E2E testing. Essential for TypeScript projects with UI components, providing reliable cross-browser testing capabilities.
